headline: 2025-10-27 — ArXiv paper authors demonstrated an interactive energy state-space model on 1 RLC circuit (1 circuit) as an illustrative controllable component.

2025-10-28 — The same ArXiv paper specified implementation of the reactive-power control command using 2 control methods: Feedback Linearizing Control (FBLC) and Sliding Mode Control (SMC) (2 methods).

2025-10-29 — A correction note was published that issues 1 formal correction (1 correction note) identifying a 'pretty serious mistake' and several inaccuracies in Olfati-Saber, Fax, and Murray (2007).

2025-10-30 — The correction note claims at least 1 stronger result applicable to the examined class of multi-agent consensus problems and explicitly addresses priority interpretation for 1 referenced paper (1 priority issue addressed).
2025-10-29 — The correction note explicitly targets conclusions in 1 influential 2007 Proceedings of the IEEE paper (1 paper), which may alter interpretation of results that cite that paper.
